name: CKFetchRecordZoneChangesOperation.ZoneConfiguration
desc: A configuration object that describes the information to fetch from a record zone.

items.name: init(previousServerChangeToken: CKServerChangeToken?, resultsLimit: Int?, desiredKeys: [CKRecord.FieldKey]?)
items.desc: Creates a zone configuration with the desired keys and a result limit for updates.

items.name: var resultsLimit: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of records that CloudKit retrieves when fetching zone changes.

items.name: var desiredKeys: [CKRecord.FieldKey]?
items.desc: An array of the record keys to retrieve.
